blog.name: ao3feed-todobakudeku
blog.title: OT3 is Life
blog.description: All fics are posted automatically. Thanks to nikkiyan for the avi

summary: square one (hardest part was leaving you)
title: square one (hardest part was leaving you)
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2I9NCMn

by aquirkoficeandfire (ctr56)

It had been an almost flawless plan.

Months of discussion and careful planning were supposed to guarantee they would take down the League of Villains, once and for all.

But things don’t always go the way they’re supposed to. They had quickly realised it was a trap, that not even all of the inside information could help avoid.

The villains escaped, leaving one of theirs behind.

Well, not exactly. He wasn’t really one of them.

They were supposed to think so, though.

Words: 2483, Chapters: 2/10, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Dabi (My Hero Academia), Hawks (My Hero Academia), Todoroki Enji | Endeavor, Todoroki Shouto, Todoroki Touya, Todoroki Shouto’s Siblings, Tsukauchi Naomasa, Pro Heroes (My Hero Academia), Midoriya Izuku, Bakugou Katsuki, Kirishima Eijirou, Iida Tenya, Uraraka Ochako, Asui Tsuyu, Amajiki Tamaki, Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead, League of Villains (My Hero Academia), Todoroki Rei, Ujiko (My Hero Academia)
  • Relationships: Dabi/Hawks (My Hero Academia), Onesided Dabi/Shigaraki Tomura | Shimura Tenko, Implied Bakugou Katsuki/Midoriya Izuku/Todoroki Shouto, Implied Iida Tensei | Ingenium/Todoroki Fuyumi
  • Additional Tags: Dabi is a Todoroki, Dabi is Todoroki Touya, Hero Dabi (My Hero Academia), Undercover, Covert Operation, Todoroki Enji | Endeavor’s Bad Parenting, Implied/Referenced Child Abuse, Fluff and Hurt/Comfort, Mild Language

blog.name: ao3feed-kiribaku
blog.title: Shitty Hair x Blasty Fanfics
blog.description:
☆Kirishima Eijirou/Bakugou Katsuki fanfics☆
☆Please check the FAQ before asking anything thank you☆
☆Created 3/18/2019, no fics from before this date can appear here☆

summary: Are you sure this is what you want?
title: Are you sure this is what you want?
description:
by RockNoodle

Kirishima just Got confessed to by Mina, now they’re together, he likes Mina but he doesn’t really know if it’s platonic or romantic yet, but now he also has to help out Bakugou who’s grumpier than usual, and that honestly came out of nowhere. He didn’t think he did anything to upset him, but Bakugous avoiding him.

Or alternatively summarized - Kirishima realizing his gay and Bakugou being a total tsundere.

Words: 294, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/M, M/M

  • Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki/Kirishima Eijirou, Ashido Mina/Kirishima Eijirou, Todoroki Shouto/Yaoyorozu Momo, Midoriya Izuku/Uraraka Ochako, Jirou Kyouka/Kaminari Denki
  • Additional Tags: Fluff, Angst, Fluff and Angst, idk how to tag

title: It's time to catch up
description:
by Emmett13chibs

Bakugou Katsuki has been off away in America for the past 7 years doing hero work, and after all this time is coming back home to everyone he left behind. And a lot of shit happened in those 7 years, he has a lot to catch up on.

Words: 815, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence, Major Character Death
  • Categories: Other

  • Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki/Kirishima Eijirou, Kirishima Eijirou/Midoriya Izuku, Midoriya Izuku/Todoroki Shouto
  • Additional Tags: Izuku is good at story telling, Katskui has a breakdown, Kiri and Baku are like brothers, smut-free, Kinda edgy and sad, Everyone is all grown up, 1-A are all Adult heroes now

blog.name: ochabowlzine
blog.title: Caught in your orbit: An Ochabowl Zine
blog.description:
An SFW zine centered around the romantic relationships between Ochako Uraraka and other various Boku no Hero Academia characters
Answered asks | Updates
Mobile links | Twitter

summary: Mod applications open! Hello! I am happy to announce that we are opening mod applications! Heres what you need to know: -...
body:
Mod applications open!

Hello! I am happy to announce that we are opening mod applications!

Heres what you need to know:
- Applications will be open until 15th May
- I am mainly looking for mods that can cover the production period, ie finances, shipping, actual zine production
- The more of these fields you can cover, the better
- Dont be afraid to apply if your strengths lay elsewhere, another pair of eyes is always good to have!
- I will be also taking up one or two mod-interns
- They will serve as a right hand to the other mods and will be helping with the asks
- The only requirement for the mod-intern position is that you havent modded a zine before

Apply as a mod here
Apply as a mod-intern here
Alternate link for mod application: https://forms.gle/ypH2MzTo4pM9qcQn9
Alternate link or the mod-intern application: https://forms.gle/C9wNkJJF7vHmMrhL7

FAQ | Schedule | The current mods | Interest check

tags: boku no hero academia x reader
summary: aged up! (kindergarten AU pt. 2) | various x reader
title: aged up! (kindergarten AU pt. 2) | various x reader
body:
Title: Aged Up!

Character: Bakugo Katsuki, Midoriya Izuku, Todoroki Shoto

Plot: Now you’re in high school, and life is beyond unbearable. At least you have your best friend to keep you above ground.

Genre: fluff, SLIGHT angst

Warnings: None

Requested?: Yes

Word Count: 1,101 words

Chapters: 2/2

A/N: Okay thank god someone asked for more because I wanted to write more for Midoriya anyway but now I get to GO OFF. Thank you all for requesting things so far! It means a lot to me :)) This is a continuation of Part 1.

Izuku

It had been years since you first uttered the word hero when describing Izuku. Ever since that day he had devoted plenty of his time to helping you whenever he possibly could, whether that be walking you home or scratching your back in a hard to reach space. You had continued to call him your hero, which allowed his confidence to grow.

As the two of you grew, your quirk began to form and he was left in the dust. The second your mind was able to transfer moisture in the air into a water attack was the day he knew he was going to be left behind. You and your quirk were thriving, but he merely sat back and watched from the sidelines–quirkless.

He never stopped trying to help you. His quirklessness didn’t discourage him, and he knew that he had to do whatever he could to live up to the hero name you gave him.

As the years tore by, your heart began to grow further and further from him. You didn’t need him to help you anymore, you were growing up to be stronger. And so, he grew to just watch you, being sure to keep a constant protective eye over you–just in case the need for him were to arise.

But it never did.

“Y/N!” He cried out as a pencil fell from your grasp, scrambling to throw himself onto the ground and pick up your pencil. “Y-you dropped this!” He sputtered, lifting the pencil up as sweat beaded on his forehead. God, he was so smooth.

You stared down at him, blinking once before a soft smile was etched into your skin. “Thank you, Izuku.” You said gently, taking the pencil from his grasp before adding on. “You’re my hero.”

He gasped, a light crimson spreading across his cheeks. “Y-your hero?” He murmured quietly, standing up from the floor. “You… you remember?”

“How could I forget? You’ve always been my hero, Izuku.” You purred, reaching out your hand to take his before giving it a gentle squeeze. The spring air that surrounded you two caused your hair to flow throughout the breeze. You looked radiant to him.

“Y/N…” He said quietly, looking down at the hand you held. “I love you.”

You lifted your gaze to meet his, the heat rushing to your cheeks as you began to process what he had just said to you. “You… What? Love me?” Your voice was barely above a whisper, the thoughts he uttered surprising you greatly.

“I-I always have. I just… Thought you should know.” He said nervously.

“Oh, Izuku, I love you too.”

Katsuki

The first time Katsuki realized he loved you was after you clambered into the river to retrieve him after he slipped off the log. The first time he grabbed your hand when he needed it most was the start of second grade. The first time he cried to you was at the start of junior high. The first time he kissed you was the start of your first year of high school. The first time he confessed his love to you was seconds after that.

Katsuki was the one to initiate everything within your relationship. He was always two steps ahead whilst he was trailing behind. He loved you most of his life, but was never sure how you felt. But everytime you reciprocated, accepting things how they were because you, too, loved him.

So, the first time he realized he loved you, your heart began to race at the touch of his hand. The first time he held your hand you squeezed it right back. The first time he cried to you you ran a hand through his hair and comforted him with gentle coos. The first time he kissed you, you kissed him back, your hands reaching up to clasp the sides of his face. The first time her confessed his love to you, you told the truth.

“Katsuki. I love you too.”

His eyes widened and he looked up at you, not exactly sure if he heard you correctly. “Y/N… You do? Are you sure?” His hands were still on your waist from when he kissed you. You smiled gently, trailing your hands down his chest as you gleamed up at her.

“Yes. I have been sure of it for years.” You murmured before leaning forward to press another kiss to his lips, enjoying the tranquility that surrounded the two of you.

Shoto

Yeah, nothing had changed since you two were children. Your first kiss was third grade and it was on the playground after you slid down the slide. You and Shoto were the simplest of young couples. You couldn’t be separated, and most of the time you two were out in public you were almost always together.

You two really started to seriously date at the end of junior high, when you both mutually agreed that you should hold hands and stop being so awkward. You were quiet when you touched each other, and you never imagined being separated from him.

His father tried his hardest to keep you away, insisting that you were a distraction to his son, but you continued to rise up and fight against him. You loved Shoto, and you knew since the day you met that you were going to be with him forever–and you were okay with that.

The first day of high school you two met at your house, trying your hardest not to grow too separated now that you went to separate schools. The two of you laid in your bed, arms and legs entangled together in a mess of limbs. You loved the smell of him, how it was spicy but cool at the same time.

His hand trailed down your back as you rambled on about your day, describing each class you had and who was in it–mentioning kids that you two mutually knew that happened to be in your class. He hummed every once in a while, nodding whenever he heard a name that he recognized.

You turned your head to look up to him, a wide smile on your cheeks. “What about you? Was UA everything you imagined?” You murmured gently, tracing your fingers along his chest, taking in every curve that was presented to you. The way his toned muscles felt underneath your touch. It was intoxicating.

Shoto mirrored your smile. “It’s amazing.” He said simply, ducking his head down to press a kiss to the top of your head before continuing on. “I couldn’t stop thinking about you all day.”

You turned your head to look up to him, a wide smile on your cheeks. “What about you? Was UA everything you imagined?” You murmured gently, tracing your fingers along his chest, taking in every curve that was presented to you. The way his toned muscles felt underneath your touch. It was intoxicating.
